Brothers Falala and Valiami Iongi sentenced for murder of Auckland grandmother Meliame Fisi’ihoi https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/brothers-falala-and-valiami-iongi-sentenced-for-murder-of-auckland-grandmother-meliame-fisiihoi/4VZU7SSNJFDVRGT7P34TUK5YEY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/brothers-falala-and-valiami-iongi-sentenced-for-murder-of-auckland-grandmother-meliame-fisiihoi/4VZU7SSNJFDVRGT7P34TUK5YEY/ Craig KapitanThe bullet was intended for the victim's son. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 01:11:58 +0000 Meliame Fisi'ihoi was killed in her South Auckland home in 2020. Brothers Falala and Valiami Iongi were found guilty of murder while cousin Manu Iongi was found guilty of manslaughter. All three were sentenced today.
